name: Friedman Industries, Incorporated
description: Friedman Industries, Incorporated is a diversified manufacturing and distribution company primarily involved in the steel and metal industry. Established in 1965, the company has built a strong reputation for providing high-quality steel products and services to a variety of sectors, including construction, transportation, and manufacturing. Friedman Industries operates through two main segments: the steel processing segment, which offers hot-rolled and cold-rolled steel products, and the steel distribution segment, which supplies steel to various industries across the United States. The company is known for its commitment to quality and customer service, ensuring that its products meet stringent industry standards. With a focus on innovation and operational efficiency, Friedman Industries continues to expand its product offerings and enhance its service capabilities. The company emphasizes sustainability and responsible manufacturing practices, aiming to reduce its environmental footprint while meeting the evolving needs of its customers. With a dedicated workforce and strategic partnerships, Friedman Industries is well-positioned to navigate the challenges of the global steel market and capitalize on growth opportunities.

faq.answer: Friedman Industries is headquartered in Longview, Texas, USA.

faq.answer: Friedman Industries offers hot-rolled steel, cold-rolled steel, steel sheets, and steel processing services.
